name: Defender of the Turrets: Warp Attack (itch)
name_original: Defender of the Turrets: Warp Attack (itch)
description:
Defender of the Turrets : Warp Attack

is an Arcade Shooter where you can buy different Towers and upgrade them to destroy incoming Enemies.

Controls:
  •  Aim with Mouse
  • Shoot with Left Mouse-Click
  • Press 1 to switch between Auto and Manual Control for Additional Towers
  • Escape for Pause
Bullet Hell Jam Game Features:
  • 10 Waves, roughly Balanced
  • 3 Different Towers.
  • Upgradeable Towers
  • 5 Different Enemies with different Speed
  • Physics, Shooting on Ships slow them down.
  • Auto Aim for Additional Towers.
  • Highscore and Highest Wave.
Best Played in Fullscreen Development:

This Game is in an Early Alpha Development Stage.

Additional Updates are already planned.

Follow us to keep up to date with Defender of the Turrets.

This Game was Made for Bullet Hell Jam
